right.item:
Indications

A phenylalanine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in individuals aged 8 years and older.

Product Features

  • Phenylalanine free
  • Low volume
  • Contains the necessary mixture of amino acids, carbohydrates, minerals, trace elements and vitamins to meet the daily nutritional needs of this age group
  • Provides 60g of protein equivalent per 100 g of powder
  • Available as orange, lemon, tropical and unflavored powder
  • Interchangeable with PKU Express Cooler
  • Convenient and great tasting

Important Information

Available at the end of this page.

PKU Express must only be given to patients with proven Phenylketonuria and under strict medical supervision.  It is not recommended for infants under 8 years of age. PKU Express is not for parenteral use.

Dosage and Administration

  • Dosage of PKU Express should be determined by the clinician or dietitian
  • The daily protein requirement is given as PKU Express (100 g is equivalent to 60 g of protein).
  • Additional protein is provided from natural protein sources containing 50 mg of phenylalanine.  The number of daily portions is adjusted according to plasma phenylalanine concentrations.
  • Foods high in carbohydrate and fat but low in protein should be provided as an energy source to supply the remainder of daily calories.
 
Guidelines for Preparation and Use
  1. Empty the contents of a sachet into a beaker (provided) and add cold water to about half way up the beaker (approximately 80 ml).  Secure the lid and shake for 10 seconds.  Serve and drink immediately.
  2. Water or permitted drinks should be taken after the PKU Express. 
  3. Cover and refrigerate any unused formula.  Use prepared formula within 24 hours.  Shake well before serving.
  4. Flavor Pac sachets can be added to the product if desired.

Storage

Store unopened sachets at room temperature.  After opening, store tightly sealed sachet in a cool, dry place and use within one month.  Avoid storing product in areas of extreme temperatures.

Availability
Product Number Description Packaging NDC Format Code
053206 PKU express unflavored 30 x 25g sachets 50600-0532-06
053220 PKU express orange 30 x 25g sachets 50600-0532-20
053305 PKU express lemon 30 x 25g sachets 50600-0533-05
05336 PKU express tropical 30 x 25g sachets 50600-0533-36
